channel.title: Peter Kent
channel.description: Recent news about Peter Kent, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by 680 News
item.description:
Schwarzenegger's stunt double to host seminar in Vaughan
Photo courtesy of: peterkent.com. Peter Kent, Arnold Schwarzenegger's stunt double. Peter Kent (not MP Peter Kent!) was stuntman to Arnold Schwarzenegger for 15 years in 15 movies including “Terminator 1,” “Terminator 2,” “Total Recall” and “True Lies.”.

item.title: Mentioned by Simcoe.com
item.description:
Thornhill MP not upset at losing cabinet post
Arguably the biggest change here in York, that being Conservative Thornhill MP Peter Kent's shift from environment minister to backbencher, was teased by Mr. Kent himself in the week or so leading up to the announcement. Reached following the cabinet ...

item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
Cabinet Enemy Lists: Peter Kent Says Phrase Reminds Him Of Nixon
Former environment minister Peter Kent, shuffled to the backbench on Monday, has a problem with the so-called "enemy lists" reportedly given to new ministers by the Prime Minister's Office. A leaked memo shows that in the leadup to this week's cabinet shuffle, .... Raitt has also waded through several crises, both during her time at the Port Authority and as an MP, a skill she'll have to employ while dealing with the fallout from the Lac-Megantic disaster. And, with rumours that Harper could step down before the 2015 ...

item.title: Mentioned by HQ Yellowknife
item.description:
Agluukaq takes over environment portfolio
The Nunavut MP and one-time Yellowknife resident replaces Peter Kent in the environment portfolio. Canadian environmentalists were universal in their condemnation of Kent in the high profile cabinet post. Aglukkaq became the first to serve on the cabinet ...
